title: wweb.dev
description: Stay up to date with weekly updates, get resources for next project and read articles and tutorials about web development.

items.content_html: In this article, I will share a step-by-step guide on how to deploy and serve a web app to an ubuntu server. This applicable for any web app that runs on a port.

items.summary: In this article, I will share a step-by-step guide on how to deploy and serve a web app to an ubuntu server. This applicable for any web app that runs on a port.
